357470.name: An Alternative Reality: The Football Manager Documentary
357470.description: Featuring contributions from some of Football Manager’s creators and famous fans from the worlds of football and entertainment, 'An Alternative Reality: The Football Manager Documentary' examines the game’s enduring appeal and how it has seeped into and influenced the culture of the world’s favourite game.
357470.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 原生支持 Steam 控制器
